channel.title: Compression - Huffman Coding :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Next, let’s take a look at another form of compression called Huffman coding. Huffman coding uses the frequency of the letters in a piece of text to reduce the amount of space that they take up in the encoded data. To do this, we will count the occurrences of each character in our text. And we’ll use that count to make a binary tree with the data.
